verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> unto them that <S%H2710>decree<s%> <S%H205>unrighteous<s%> <S%H2711>decrees<s%>, and that <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H5999>grievousness<s%> which they have <S%H3789>prescribed<s%>;

To turn <S%H5186>aside<s%> the <S%H1800>needy<s%> from <S%H1779>judgment<s%>, and to take <S%H1497>away<s%> the <S%H4941>right<s%> from the <S%H6041>poor<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, that <S%H490>widows<s%> may be their <S%H7998>prey<s%>, and that they may <S%H962>rob<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>!

And what will ye <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6486>visitation<s%>, and in the <S%H7722>desolation<s%> which shall <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H4801>far<s%>? to whom will ye <S%H5127>flee<s%> for <S%H5833>help<s%>? and where will ye <S%H5800>leave<s%> your <S%H3519>glory<s%>?

Without me they <S%H1115>shall<s%> bow <S%H3766>down<s%> under the <S%H616>prisoners<s%>, and they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> under the <S%H2026>slain<s%>. For all this his <S%H639>anger<s%> is not turned <S%H7725>away<s%>, but his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is stretched out <S%H5186>still<s%>.
¶ <S%H1945>O<s%> <S%H804>Assyrian<s%>, the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of mine <S%H639>anger<s%>, and the <S%H4294>staff<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand<s%> is mine <S%H2195>indignation<s%>.

I will <S%H7971>send<s%> him against an <S%H2611>hypocritical<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>, and against the <S%H5971>people<s%> of my <S%H5678>wrath<s%> will I give him a <S%H6680>charge<s%>, to <S%H7997>take<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%>, and to <S%H962>take<s%> the <S%H957>prey<s%>, and to tread them <S%H7760%H4823>down<s%> like the <S%H2563>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets<s%>.

Howbeit he <S%H1819>meaneth<s%> not so, neither doth his <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H2803>think<s%> so; but it is in his <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> and cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> not a <S%H4592>few<s%>.
For he <S%H559>saith<s%>, Are not my <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H3162>altogether<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%>?
Is not <S%H3641>Calno<s%> as <S%H3751>Carchemish<s%>? is not <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> as <S%H774>Arpad<s%>? is not <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> as <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>?

As my <S%H3027>hand<s%> hath <S%H4672>found<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H457>idols<s%>, and whose graven <S%H6456>images<s%> did excel them of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>;
Shall I not, as I have <S%H6213>done<s%> unto <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> and her <S%H457>idols<s%>, so <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and her <S%H6091>idols<s%>?

Wherefore it shall come to pass, that when the <S%H136>Lord<s%> hath <S%H1214>performed<s%> his whole <S%H4639>work<s%> upon <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> and on <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H1433>stout<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, and the <S%H8597>glory<s%> of his <S%H7312>high<s%> <S%H5869>looks<s%>.

For he <S%H559>saith<s%>, By the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of my <S%H3027>hand<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> it, and by my <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>; for I am <S%H995>prudent<s%>: and I have <S%H5493>removed<s%> the <S%H1367>bounds<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and have <S%H8154>robbed<s%> their <S%H6259%H6264>treasures<s%>, and I have put <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> like a <S%H47%H3524>valiant<s%> man:

And my <S%H3027>hand<s%> hath <S%H4672>found<s%> as a <S%H7064>nest<s%> the <S%H2428>riches<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>: and as one <S%H622>gathereth<s%> <S%H1000>eggs<s%> that are <S%H5800>left<s%>, have I <S%H622>gathered<s%> all the <S%H776>earth<s%>; and there was none that <S%H5074>moved<s%> the <S%H3671>wing<s%>, or <S%H6475>opened<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, or <S%H6850>peeped<s%>.

Shall the <S%H1631>axe<s%> <S%H6286>boast<s%> itself against him that <S%H2672>heweth<s%> therewith? or shall the <S%H4883>saw<s%> <S%H1431>magnify<s%> itself against him that <S%H5130>shaketh<s%> it? as if the <S%H7626>rod<s%> should <S%H5130>shake<s%> itself against them that lift it <S%H7311>up<s%>, or as if the <S%H4294>staff<s%> should lift <S%H7311>up<s%> itself, as if it were no <S%H6086>wood<s%>.

Therefore shall the <S%H113>Lord<s%>, the <S%H136%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, <S%H7971>send<s%> among his fat <S%H4924>ones<s%> <S%H7332>leanness<s%>; and under his <S%H3519>glory<s%> he shall <S%H3344>kindle<s%> a <S%H3350>burning<s%> like the burning of a <S%H784>fire<s%>.

And the <S%H216>light<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be for a <S%H784>fire<s%>, and his Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> for a <S%H3852>flame<s%>: and it shall <S%H1197>burn<s%> and <S%H398>devour<s%> his <S%H7898>thorns<s%> and his <S%H8068>briers<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>;

And shall <S%H3615>consume<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of his <S%H3293>forest<s%>, and of his fruitful <S%H3759>field<s%>, both <S%H5315>soul<s%> and <S%H1320>body<s%>: and they shall be as when a <S%H5263>standardbearer<s%> <S%H4549>fainteth<s%>.
And the <S%H7605>rest<s%> of the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of his <S%H3293>forest<s%> shall be <S%H4557>few<s%>, that a <S%H5288>child<s%> may <S%H3789>write<s%> them.

¶ And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and such as are <S%H6413>escaped<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, shall no more <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H8172>stay<s%> upon him that <S%H5221>smote<s%> them; but shall <S%H8172>stay<s%> upon the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, in <S%H571>truth<s%>.
The <S%H7605>remnant<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%>, even the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, unto the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>.

For though thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, yet a <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of them shall <S%H7725>return<s%>: the <S%H3631>consumption<s%> <S%H2782>decreed<s%> shall <S%H7857>overflow<s%> with <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

For the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H3617>consumption<s%>, even <S%H2782>determined<s%>, in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of all the <S%H776>land<s%>.

¶ Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, O my <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3427>dwellest<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%>: he shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> thee with a <S%H7626>rod<s%>, and shall lift <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H4294>staff<s%> against thee, after the <S%H1870>manner<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
For yet a <S%H4213>very<s%> little <S%H4592>while<s%>, and the <S%H2195>indignation<s%> shall <S%H3615>cease<s%>, and mine <S%H639>anger<s%> in their <S%H8399>destruction<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> shall stir <S%H5782>up<s%> a <S%H7752>scourge<s%> for him according to the <S%H4347>slaughter<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> at the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of <S%H6159>Oreb<s%>: and as his <S%H4294>rod<s%> was upon the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, so shall he lift it <S%H5375>up<s%> after the <S%H1870>manner<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that his <S%H5448>burden<s%> shall be taken <S%H5493>away<s%> from off thy <S%H7926>shoulder<s%>, and his <S%H5923>yoke<s%> from off thy <S%H6677>neck<s%>, and the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> shall be <S%H2254>destroyed<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H8081>anointing<s%>.
He is <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5857>Aiath<s%>, he is <S%H5674>passed<s%> to <S%H4051>Migron<s%>; at <S%H4363>Michmash<s%> he hath laid <S%H6485>up<s%> his <S%H3627>carriages<s%>:

They are gone <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H4569>passage<s%>: they have taken up their <S%H4411>lodging<s%> at <S%H1387>Geba<s%>; <S%H7414>Ramah<s%> is <S%H2729>afraid<s%>; <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> is <S%H5127>fled<s%>.

Lift <S%H6670>up<s%> thy <S%H6963>voice<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H1530>of<s%> <S%H1554>Gallim<s%>: cause it to be <S%H7181>heard<s%> unto <S%H3919>Laish<s%>, O <S%H6041>poor<s%> <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%>.
<S%H4088>Madmenah<s%> is <S%H5074>removed<s%>; the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1374>Gebim<s%> gather themselves to <S%H5756>flee<s%>.

As yet shall he <S%H5975>remain<s%> at <S%H5011>Nob<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%>: he shall <S%H5130>shake<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> against the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H1323%H1004>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And he shall cut <S%H5362>down<s%> the <S%H5442>thickets<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> with <S%H1270>iron<s%>, and <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by a mighty <S%H117>one<s%>.
